item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Bandwidth_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Bandwidth_Summary Datatype Description This data type provides commonly used bandwidth summary components for the current billing cycle. Local allocationAmount This is the amount of bandwidth (measured in gigabytes) allocated for this tracking object. Type: float allocationId Type: integer amountOut The amount of outbound bandwidth (measured in gigabytes) currently used this billing period. Same as $outboundBandwidthAmount. Aliased for backward compatability.
